title: Find curator names & contacts
description: Find all the names and contacts of the curators at the top NFT platforms (SuperRare, Foundation, Async, Art Blocks, Nifty Gateway, KnownOrigin, MakersPlace, Magic Eden, Zora, Rarible)

title: Plan workflow for using the assistant
description: Research and recommend the best way for Anton to plan and manage work with the assistant (task cadence, approvals, credential handling, automation limits). Deliver a short SOP + suggested queue rules.

title: Research: best visual tracking for multiple projects
description: Research and recommend the best visual system (Kanban/board/timeline/dashboard) to track multiple projects and how the assistant integrates. Deliver templates & quickstart.

title: Install tools from Telegram + permissions
description: Find a secure method for installing tools directly via Telegram commands and granting the assistant necessary permissions. Deliver mechanism, security controls, and implementation steps.
